data.title: Colorado Springs Event Center
data.meta_description: Our 36,000 square foot free span indoor event center can host a variety of events. Outside our 5,500 seat stadium houses equestrian events, motorsports and more.
data.meta_site_name: Norris Penrose Colorado Springs Event Center
data.text:
Welcome to the Home and Landscape Expo. This comprehensive event brings together homeowners and many of the most knowledgeable and experienced remodeling, landscaping and building experts. Every aspect of the home can be explored, from the smallest design detail to the largest house addition. Professionals will be on hand to share their valuable knowledge to bring your ideas to life or inspire you with new ones. See the latest innovations and design trends! Experts will be showcasing everything for the home including, but not limited to, the latest in cabinetry and countertops, flooring, sunrooms and additions, basement finishing, waterproofing, smart home automation, energy efficient windows and exterior products, as well as the newest ideas pertaining to landscape installations. Be inspired by the feature gardens built right inside the exhibit hall - a great precursor to spring! Make plans to visit with the most knowledgeable experts in the area at the Home and Landscape Expo. This all-encompassing event will surely put you on the path towards making your dream home a reality. As an added bonus, parking is free. We look forward to seeing you at the Norris-Penrose Event Center this February! FEATURED EXHIBITOR Jake’s Designs is an award winning, Colorado Springs based, landscape company established in 2000. Jake’s Designs specializes in guiding homeowners through the process of the landscape design all the way through the installation of the project. F&B Landscape, Inc.'s mission is to perform residential and commercial landscape installation and commercial landscaping maintenance services at the highest level. They believe in demonstrating integrity, quality, and efficiency while building and maintaining relationships with their neighbors in Colorado Springs and the surrounding areas. Sprinklers Inc & Landscaping offers the highest quality landscaping and sprinkler services at reasonable prices. Their goal is to surpass each and every one of our customer's expectations while staying within a competitive price range. Genesis Group's team of trained landscapers in Colorado Springs fulfills every single need of your project with superior craftsmanship and custom-built design. They create beautiful, custom landscapes, decks, cover, hardscapes and more! Innorev Home Solutions, LLC provides innovative composite decking and railling systems to meet your homes needs with low maintenance and high durability. Their composite decking is made with a unique combination of reclaimed wood and plastic, giving you the best qualities of both materials. DreamMaker Bath & Kitchen strives to provide our clients with the expertise and professionalism that is uncommon in the home remodeling industry. Bordner Home Improvement provides custom solutions to transform your home; from the highest-quality replacement windows, to luxurious bath remodels.No matter how large or small your home improvement needs, they are there to exceed your expectations from start to finish.

$15 FOR THREE DAYS OF THE COLORADO SPRINGS GUN SHOW: FRI 3-7 + SAT 9-5 + SUN 9-4 No refunds on any ticket purchases, for any reason, including weather, and sorry, no pets allowed at the show. Norris Penrose Event Center 1045 Lower Gold Camp Rd. Colorado Springs, CO 80905 We’ve been around since 1964 and we are now expanding into Colorado Springs with 500 tables at the newly remodeled, including a beautiful concrete floor, Norris Penrose Event Center. At our Colorado Springs gun show, you’ll find 500 tables with all types of guns, knives, ammunition, survival gear/food, and related hunting and fishing accessories including, holsters, western wear, gun safes, books, and war relics, and other collectibles. You are guaranteed the largest selection of old and new firearms in the state because we attract vendors from throughout the Western half of the U.S. Concealed carry permit classes are also available at each show through Effective Firearms Training. Classes are held once on Saturday and once on Sunday during the show. Please visit our concealed carry page for more information on the classes including pricing and times. DON’T FORGET THAT EVERY COLORADO SPRINGS GUN SHOW IS BUY, SELL, & TRADE! CUSTOMERS ARE ENCOURAGED TO BRING IN THEIR GUNS TO SELL, TRADE, OR GET AN APPRAISAL From the coolest gadgets and technologies to antiques and collector’s items, you’ll find it all here. Although the focus of the show is guns, knives, and outdoor equipment, there are also some other items for those not interested in guns, such as beef jerky, western wear, jewelry, artwork, and books. Additionally, there is a restaurant on-site with a large seating area. PLENTY OF FREE PARKING AVAILABLE! Strollers must be checked.

Welcome to the Colorado Springs Home Building & Remodeling Show, presented at the Norris-Penrose Event Center. The Colorado Springs Home Building & Remodeling Show brings Colorado Springs homeowners together with the area's top remodeling and building experts. Every aspect of the home can be explored, from the smallest design detail to the largest house addition. Professionals will be on hand, sharing their valuable knowledge to bring your ideas to life or inspire you with new ones. See the latest innovations and design trends -- Experts will be showcasing everything for the home, including the latest in: Kitchens | Bathrooms | Cabinetry | Countertops | Flooring | Sunrooms and Additions | Basement Finishing | Waterproofing | Smart Home Automation| Energy Efficient Windows | Exterior Products | Painting | Roofing | Handyman Services | Hot Tubs and Spas | Landscape Installations and Ideas Make plans to visit the Norris-Penrose Event Center for the Colorado Springs Home Building & Remodeling Show. This all-encompassing event will put you on the path towards making your dream home a reality. FEATURED EXHIBITORS Bordner Home Improvement provides custom solutions to transform your home; from the highest-quality replacement windows, to luxurious bath remodels. No matter how large or small your home improvement needs, they are there to exceed your expectations from start to finish. Backyards and Billiards offer's a nice compliment of Hot Tubs, Billiards and Game Room Furniture: Bullfrog Spas, Tuff Spas, American Whirlpools, Maax Power Pools/Swim Spas, Brunswick, Presidential Billiards, Foosball, Shuffleboard, Air Hockey Custom BBQ's, fire pits & custom outdoor kitchens. Dun-Rite Home Improvements craftsmen will “WOW” you with their skill and artistry, Their installers and tradesmen will remind you of the days when service people cared about the quality of their work and their customer relationships. Since 1985, “If you’re ‘gonna do it, do it right or don’t bother” ™ isn’t just their slogan, it’s actually the way they run their business. Whether you want a simple update or a complete tear out and remodel, they can help. For over 50 years, International Homes of Cedar has designed and delivered the finest custom cedar and pine timber dream homes throughout the U.S. and around the world. Their laminated timber walls and patented interlocking system are the perfect combination for a state-of-the-art home that lasts a lifetime. If you can dream it, they can create it. American Overhead Door's goal is to give you a garage door you can be proud of. They offer a wide variety of designs and functions that you can choose from, so you’ll know you’re getting a door to fit your needs perfectly. Your garage door is one of the first things you’ll see that’ll remind you that you’re home. When you have a beautiful garage door awaiting your arrival, it makes the transition from a long day at work to an evening of relaxation that much sweeter. Affinity Mortgage Brokers is a premier mortgage broker located in Colorado Springs. We are veteran owned with 50+ years combined experience in the mortgage industry. Purely Ponds Fine Landscapes designs and installs complete landscapes in addition to water features. The Purely Ponds team thrives because of customer referrals, which means anything less than total customer satisfactions is unacceptable. They offer xeriscaping, outdoor kitchens, patios and fine landscape options. Granite Transformations is a premier home and businesses renovation company specializing in kitchens and bathrooms. They have performed many renovations using a unique process which requires little-to-no demolition. This process reduces the stress of a typical intrusive and disruptive installation, along with the problems and setbacks typical of such home improvement projects. They have a wide variety of top-notch products that are designed to fit any project and any budget. Vision Sync Home Improvement is a premiere home remodeling company accepting jobs throughout the Front Range as far north as Cheyenne, WY and as far south as Pueblo, CO. Vision Sync Home Improvement LLC has chosen to work with only the most reliable and top of the line suppliers that can get material needed to customers specifications in as little as four business days. HOMEfix is a home remodeling, handyman repair, and roofing company serving the Greater Colorado Springs area, including Monument, Fountain, Woodland Park, and Falcon. Services include kitchen remodeling, bathroom remodeling, basement finishing, roof replacement & repair, solar installation, HVAC installation & repair, painting services, drywall repair, flooring installation, siding repair, tile repair, deck repair, custom carpentry, fence replacement, and more. The team of HVAC contractors from Mitchell Heating Colorado has, with dedication, serving residential and commercial property owners in Colorado Springs, Denver, and Northern Colorado with their heating and cooling service needs for many years. You can trust us for all your heating and cooling service needs, whether you need repair, maintenance, or replacement. We will ensure that your Colorado Springs property does not go without a working HVAC system when you need it most!

Welcome back to Norris-Penrose Events Center / Bear Creek Park! In the beginning, Jan 1, 1979, the Rescue Run Start/Finish was at Norris-Penrose Events Center, then moved to Palmer Park in 1995. After many wonderful years at Palmer Park, we are returning back to our roots! But rather than run on the streets, as we did then, we will be running on the trails of Bear Creek Park East. We are excited to be back with a new course to welcome in the New Year for our 45th time! These items of interest were new last year and are returning for this year's race: NEW LAST YEAR: Start/Finish location change to: Norris-Penrose Events Center 1045 Lower Gold Camp Rd, Colorado Springs, CO 80905 NEW LAST YEAR: 5K and 10K start together at 10:00am. If you prefer a more spread out start, the start will be available for approximately 10 minutes after the group start. Please cross starting line timing mats by 10:10am No race day registration. Online registration ends Dec 31, 6:00PM Mountain Time. Please expect ice in places on trails, and especially wooden bridges. Wearing shoe traction is at your discretion 1045 Lower Gold Camp Rd, Colorado Springs, CO 80905 Map to the start and parking RAIN, SNOW, OR 20° BELOW Welcome runners and walkers to our 45th year! EL PASO COUNTY SEARCH AND RESCUE (EPCSAR) Proceeds of this event go to El Paso County Search and Rescue (EPCSAR). EPCSAR provides search and rescue services primarily in the jurisdiction of El Paso County, Colorado. However, the team also responds to requests for assistance from other counties through a cooperative arrangement with the Colorado Search and Rescue Board. From the summit of Pikes Peak to the plains or eastern El Paso County and anywhere in between, the EPCSAR team is ready to help. Responding to calls for those who are lost, injured, or ill on a trail or in the forest, stranded, lost, or experiencing a medical emergency during a blizzard, any time of day or night, these dedicated volunteers stand ready to respond, 24/7/365. All members purchase their own equipment and contribute hundreds of volunteer hours to the community. EPCSAR never charges for their services. Donations made during race registration will NOT be charged a processing fee. RACE FEES / SCHEDULE / IMPORTANT INFORMATION Register online until Dec 31. No race day registration. 5K and 10K start together at 10:00 am January 1. Register early for savings and to guarantee shirt availability! Now - Nov. 30 - $25 Entry Fee / $20 optional shirt. Dec 1 - Dec 31 - $35 Entry Fee / $20 optional Shirt NOTE - You must be pre-registered by Dec 31 at 6:00 PM Mountain Time. There is NO RACE DAY REGISTRATION Please email rescuerun@epcsar.org , or call/text 719-351-0045, if you are unable to preregister and we will assist you personally. Long sleeve tech shirt add-on is optional during signup. Sizes are unisex, XS - XXL. Please sign up early, in November, to guarantee shirt availability. Our supplier has warned us of possible shortages. Shirts and bibs will be available for pickup in December. You will be notified when your bib has been delivered if you are not picking it up on race day. Free: Kids runs starting at 9:30, three age-appropriate distances Switching Distance: Switching is allowed at no charge prior to the race. It is preferable that you do so online within runsignup.com before Dec 31. If you decide to switch at the race start, please let a timing official know prior to the race. Not doing so slows down awards and results. And it might be cold out there! Dogs: Pets are not allowed on the course per PPRR/RRCA rules. This is especially important on our 10K course as a portion of this course is on private property with the agreement from the landowner that we will not allow dogs. In order to secure the future use of the property, if you attempt to run the 10K with a dog, you will be stopped during the race. Trail Etiquette: No litter / No cutting corners / No off-trail travel. Any activities of this nature may result in disqualification. Please understand our stance on this in order to continue conducting this race on a mixture of private and public lands. Change in COVID protocol: We will follow and may implement, changes in our COVID protocols, up to and including canceling in-person events. If necessary, the race could be changed to a virtual event. Please understand, there will be no refunds. RACE CONTACT INFO If you have any questions about this race, please contact the race director at rescuerun@epcsar.org

Celebrate the 17th Annual Expo! Sample, Shop & Share the Fun with 170 Booths & Special Events. Connect, Be Inspired & Experience the Expo! What's Happening At The Expo Celebrate and Share the Fun at the Expo! Over 170 Exhibits, 2 Stages with Live Events and Entertainment! Save $2 off our regular admission price with Admission Tickets purchased here! TICKET SPECIAL - Get 3 FOR 1 Tickets by using promo code "3FOR1" or click here: https://www.eventbrite.com/e/340097128667/?discount=3FOR1 The Colorado Springs Women’s Expo With A Cause will be returning to the Norris-Penrose Event Center on November 5-6, 2022! Enter to Win the $2500 Vendor Gift CArd Giveaway! A weekend of food, fitness, fun and entertainment! Meet your community and connect with 170 diverse exhibits & special events on 2 Stages, fashion shows, makeovers, health screenings, popular chefs, cooking demos, book signings, enter to win contests and lots of free goodies! Join us at the Colorado Springs Women's Expo With a Cause Nov. 5th & 6th at the Norris Penrose Event Center. Colorado Springs Largest 2 Day Women’s Event kicks off with the Free Walgreen’s Healthy Mom, Healthy Baby Breakfast for expectant Moms. We celebrate Women in The Military and Military spouses with free admission to the Expo courtesy of The Mt. Carmel Veterans Service Center. We support the efforts for the Prevention of Veteran Suicide: Mt. Carmel Veterans Service Center offers a variety of wellness programs that address behavioral/mental, spiritual and physical health at little to no cost. More Information about the Expo: https://www.womenslivingexpo.com/colorado-springs-2022/ Show hours: Saturday November 5, 20212 - 10am to 5pm Sunday November 6, 2022 - 11am to 4pm. SAVE $2 with Expo Tickets purchased here! Tickets: $7 general admission in person (or $5 purchased here), children 8 and under free. Parking is Free. Tickets are also available at our Box Office during Expo Hours. More Expo information is available at our event Website: https://www.womenslivingexpo.com/colorado-springs-2022/

$15 FOR THREE DAYS OF THE COLORADO SPRINGS GUN SHOW: FRI 3-7 + SAT 9-5 + SUN 9-4 We’ve been around since 1964 and we have expanded into Colorado Springs with 500 tables at the newly remodeled, including a beautiful concrete floor, Norris Penrose Event Center. At our Colorado Springs gun show, you’ll find 500 tables with all types of guns, knives, ammunition, survival gear/food, and related hunting and fishing accessories including, holsters, western wear, gun safes, books, and war relics, and other collectibles. You are guaranteed the largest selection of old and new firearms in the state because we attract vendors from throughout the Western half of the U.S. Concealed carry permit classes are also available at each show through Effective Firearms Training. Classes are held once on Saturday and once on Sunday during the show. Please visit our concealed carry page for more information on the classes including pricing and times. DON’T FORGET THAT EVERY COLORADO SPRINGS GUN SHOW IS BUY, SELL, & TRADE! CUSTOMERS ARE ENCOURAGED TO BRING IN THEIR GUNS TO SELL, TRADE, OR GET AN APPRAISAL From the coolest gadgets and technologies to antiques and collector’s items, you’ll find it all here. Although the focus of the show is guns, knives, and outdoor equipment, there are also some other items for those not interested in guns, such as beef jerky, western wear, jewelry, artwork, and books. Additionally, there is a restaurant on-site with a large seating area. PLENTY OF FREE PARKING IS AVAILABLE!

VIP Balcony Tickets includes Free Pit Pass & Free Beer while supplies last. Presale Pit Passes and ride tickets on sale: www.MonsterTruckTour.com WHAT: MONSTER TRUCK NITRO TOUR! BACK AGAIN! BIGGER AND BETTER! WITNESS THE THUNDER! COLORADO SPRINGS, CO will be motorsport entertainment’s epicenter with the nation’s most competitive MONSTER TRUCKS as they invade the Norris Penrose Event Center on August 13th for TWO Monster shows! See these incredible 10,000-pound, car crushing giants compete in racing, wheelie contests, and then rock the house with amazing freestyle action during the Monster Truck Nitro Tour! Plus, you can see the trucks up close at the pre event Pit Party! MONSTER TRUCKS: Feel the Monster Truck Thunder! USA-1... He’s going to KNOCKOUT the Competition! BEARFOOT... This truck can take everyone OUT! GATOR... They will ALL be chasing this one! BARELY TAME... He’s gonna go WILD! FREEDOM FORCE... He’s Definitely a FORCE to be reckoned with! PIT PARTY SESSION...Come early, get up close and take photos of the Monster Trucks. Pit party pass must be accompanied by an event ticket. TUFF TRUCKS...Watch as these hard core off-roaders go head-to-head to find the toughest riders! RIDE TRUCK... That’s right! Get the ride of your life on-board a real Monster Truck during the Pit Party and Intermission! SPONSORS: NEVADA AUTO SALES, H & h Tire, Coors Lights, Coke Safeway, Louise Pizza & Monster Energy Drink. INFORMATION: All information is Subject To Change Saturday, August 13th, 2022................1:30 pm (Pit Party 12:00 pm–1:00 pm) Saturday, August 13th, 2022.................7:30 pm (Pit Party 6:00 pm–7:00 pm) NORRIS-PENROSE EVENT CENTER 1045 LOWER GOLD CAMP RD. COLORADO SPRINGS, CO 80905 (719) 635-1101 www.norrispenrose.com Advance tickets are available at online at www.MonsterTruckTour.com www.norrispenrose.com, and the Box Office OR Get them at the Gate: PIT PARTY PASSES & RIDE TRUCK TICKETS are available EXCLUSIVELY at: www.MonsterTruckTour.com Advance Tickets Adults starting at $19.90!! Kids 3-12 starting at $15.00!! Tickets are subject to a service charge. Fees may be applied – Children 2 and under are free Ticket prices go up Day of Show EVENT WILL RUN RAIN OR SHINE The latest information may be found at www.MonsterTruckTour.com ,or by calling (480) 773-6822. For facility information visit: www.norrispenrose.com
